sqls.sql: select count(*) from log where 1=1 <#if operator??> and operator='${operator_text}' </#if> <#if time1??> and time>='${time1}' </#if> <#if time2??> and time<='${time2}' </#if>

select l.*,r.name as methodname from log l left join resources r on l.method=r.method where 1=1 <#if operator??> and operator='${operator_text}' </#if> <#if time1??> and time>='${time1}' </#if> <#if time2??> and time<='${time2}' </#if> order by id desc
